top_comments.comment: Please do a Tech Analysis on PC

I wish the Avengers game by Square Enix had been like this Guardians of the Galaxy game! The games as a service ruined the Avenger game, what a huge loss. Also Deus Ex was stopped because of that live service game so that is another strike. Please support these single player games because we need more of them .

This joins my list of 'to be played on ps5 pro Console. I'm not picking up this 1080p 60fps game for a ps5 I bought for 1200 dollars. 
I'll get it for 5 dollars for my ps5 pro in November 2023.
This game is so well optimized for PC. I get 80 to 90 fps on 4k maxed out settings
The game is so much smoother at 60fps I’m keeping it in performance mode.
